amendment.description: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to Temporarily increase the floor for treatment as an extremely low DSH State and to provide for an allotment adjustment for certain States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 654 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 654 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6451-6456, S6462-6463; text: CR S6455-6456) To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to Temporarily increase the floor for treatment as an extremely low DSH State and to provide for an allotment adjustment for certain States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 654 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 654 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Bingaman.
